Canon 650D

Price: Php 26,900.00
Checkout with Multiply

18-55/55-300

 Canon EOS 650D is the first entry-level EOS camera to be powered by Canon DIGIC 5 processing, offering greater speed, responsiveness and advanced colour rendition. The Canon 650D offers a 18.0-megapixel sensor for superb still photos and Full HD videos. A Vari-angle Clear View LCD II Touch screen makes shooting simple.

  • Specifications
  • Package

 

  • IMAGE SENSOR Type: 22.3 x 14.9mm CMOS
  • Effective Pixels: Approx. 18.0 megapixels
  • Total Pixels: Approx. 18.5 megapixels
  • Aspect Ratio: 3:2
  • Low-Pass Filter: Built-in/Fixed
  • Sensor Cleaning: EOS integrated cleaning system
  • Colour Filter Type: Primary Colour
  • IMAGE PROCESSOR Type: DIGIC 5
  • Lens Mount: EF/EF-S
  • Focal Length: Equivalent to 1.6x the focal length of the lens
  • FOCUSING Type: TTL secondary image forming, phase difference detection with AF dedicated CMOS sensor
  • ISO Sensitivity: AUTO(100-6400), 100-12800 in 1-stop increments ISO can be expandable to H: 25600)
  • SHUTTER Type: Electronically-controlled focal-plane shutter
  • SHUTTER Speed: 30-1/4000 sec (1/2 or 1/3 stop increments), Bulb (Total shutter speed range. Available range varies by shooting mode)
  • VIEWFINDER Type: Pentamirror
  • LCD MONITOR Type: Touch screen vari angle 7.7cm (3.0") 3:2 Clear View II TFT, approx. 1040K dots
  • Coverage: Approx. 100%
  • Viewing Angle (Horizontally/Vertically): Approx 170 degree
  • Built-in Flash GN (ISO 100, meters): 13
  • Built-in Flash Coverage: up to 17mm focal length (35mm equivalent: 28mm)
  • Built-in Flash Recycle Time: Approx. 3 seconds
  • Modes: Auto, Manual flash, Integrated Speedlite Transmitter
  • LIVE VIEW MODE Type: Electronic viewfinder with image sensor
  • Coverage: Approx. 99% (horizontally and vertically)
  • STORAGE Type: SD, SDHC or SDXC (UHS-I)card
  • Batteries: 1 x Rechargeable Li-ion Battery LP-E8
  • Battery Life: Approx. 440
  • Dimensions (WxHxD): 133.1 x 99.8 x 78.8 mm
  • Weight (Body Only): Approx. 575g (CIPA testing standard, including battery and memory card)

 

 

  • 1 Canon EOS 650D DSLR Camera
  • 1 LP-E8 Battery Pack
  • 1 LC-E8E Battery Charger
  • 1 IFC-130U Data Cable (USB)
  • 1 EW-100DBIV Strap
  • 1 CD-ROM
  • 1 User's Guide
  • 1 Eyecup Eg
  • 1 Camera Cover R-F-3
  • Freebie 4GB / Bag /Screen protector
